description: HTML source code for the database visualizer web interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript for dynamic functionality such as fetching database lists, tables, and data, and rendering interactive tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from server API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading the database data.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entries to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays table data for a specific table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and injects an HTML table with data rows into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Converts data values into HTML table cell contents, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles the expanded view of a cell to show full content if truncated.
